ValidationRule.description: Regla que bloquea la actualización del campo 'Ocean Impo Shipment Status' cuando el campo 'Realización CE Status' tiene un valor inferior a "Recolección"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS( Name, 'SP-CE')), ISPICKVAL(Freight_Mode__c, 'Sea'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Realizacion_CE_Status__c, 'Alta Cliente AA'), ISPICKVAL( Realizacion_CE_Status__c, 'Clasificación Arancelaria'), ISPICKVAL( Realizacion_CE_Status__c, 'Realización de Facturas') ), OR( ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c, 'Booking Confirmation'), ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c, 'Pickup Confirmation'), ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c, 'Documents'), ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c, 'ETD'), ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c, 'ETA-15'), ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c, 'ETA-10'), ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c, 'ETA-7'), ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c, 'ETA-4'), ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c, 'ETA'), ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c, 'Telex Confirmation'), ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c, 'Customs Clearences'), ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c, 'Final Delivery'), ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c, 'Finished'), ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c, 'Pending Information'), ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c, 'Transport Request'), ISPICKVAL( Ocean_Shipment_Status__c, 'Booking Request') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: CE-OISS-001: No se puede cambiar "Ocean Impo Shipment Status" a esta etapa cuando no se ha confirmado la 'Recolección' por Comercio Exterior
